name: Lucent Heart
description: Lucent Heart is a free-to-play MMORPG with an emphasis on relationship building between players. Whether players decide to search for ancient treasures or dance the night away in Thereall City square, a magical and action-packed journey is no less than expected in the lands of Acadia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 and newer Processor: Pentium 4 1.3 GHz or greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 3 / ATI Radeon 8500 or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 and newer Processor: Pentium 4 2.40 GHz or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce FX 5900 / ATI 9200 or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I have been playing this game for a bit now, and I have to say, I don't know what all the fuss is about. It's a good game, but if you're a 'hardcore' FPS (first-person shooter) player, this is probably just not your cuppa. This game centers mostly around community. No, it is NOT a 'dating SIM', but there are undeniably strong elements in the game that require you to interact with other people. There is no 'world' PvP in two of the three servers, and there is very little emphasis on it overall (aside from guild wars of course) that I have been able to find thus far. That's not to say there is nothing hardcore about this game, but it's not WoW or LoL. If you're looking for a good game to relax with that you will try to get into the community on, where the majority of the cash shop items are cosmetic and you can't just buy top tier armor on your first day in the game from it, then you might want to consider Lucent Heart. I hope to see yall in game, and if you do decide to join us, come dance with us in Thereall whenever you need a break from the grind. ^.~
